story_13_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! There you are...
I’m Clair. I’ve been looking forward to this battle.
story_13_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Step right up and witness the might of our
team of dragon masters! Your streak of
good luck ends here.
story_13_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I’m Lorelei. I’m not exactly a Dragon-type
Pokémon user, but that’s no matter.
story_13_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We’ve trained hard, too.
Watch out, or I’ll put your Pokémon on ice!
story_13_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
It’s time for you to learn a lesson in strength
from a world-class master of dragons and a
queen of ice!
